college: Muthoot Institute of Technology and Science
about: Welcome to the official website of µLearn MITS!

A GTech initiative, the µLearn community is all about mutual learning. µLearn MITS reflects that true essence of learning : currently with 512 members and a total of 175.9K karma points, we are going strong!

events.head: Web Tech Quiz
events.para: The WEB TECH QUIZ is a quiz designed exclusively to test the web development knowledge in HTML, CSS , JavaScript, Backend Development, Web Security and Tech Stacks.

events.head: Python Workshop
events.para: A handson python workshop was conducted on 17th February 2024 .This workshop was led by Sivani LR, GDSC Lead at LBSITW.

events.head: Salt Mango Tree
events.para: Salt Mango Tree is a group discussion on a given topic, aimed at developing speaking skills.It was held on 7th Febrauary 2024 through Gathering Field Voice Channel.

events.head: Competitive Coding
events.para: The Competitive Coding Session was led by Mr.Gaurav Kabra, Head of Coding Club at IIIT Lucknow. Competitive Coding session provided an opportunity to know more about coding concepts, ask doubts, solve coding challenges  and connect with coding enthusiasts.

events.head: Weekly Twitch
events.para: An edition of the Inspiration Station Radio was hosted by μLearn MITS on 19th September 2023 via Discord. Ameen Abdullah, Web Developer and μLearn MITS Tech Co – Lead was the speaker.
